item.title: Multiple potholes around the first turning area in Orchard Rd. The road is clearly breaking up and they are impossible to avoid. This has been getting worse over the last few months., 6th December

First turning area in Orchard Road. Outside house nos 10-12

item.title: Multiple potholes across the road surface, 6th December
item.description:
The issue is that the majority of the steeper section of the road is covered in potholes. Having to drive up and down the road on a daily basis has caused damage to both of our cars. Tires in 6 months) have unevenly worn out due to the tracking becoming misaligned due to having to drive down and brake continually whilst hitting the holes, plus the top of the suspension spring shattered off when having to swerve into one of the deepest holes.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Stockwell Lane, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Finlay Way is not fit for purpose, 6th December
item.description:
All of the drains (covers and Gulley's) and general condition of surface need to be replaced. The road is over 30years old and is subjected to increased levels of commercial traffic since being laid in the mid 90's. You also need to check with planning how this road is registered because its Findlay Way on some maps and Evesham road on others so could be the reason why its maintenance is falling through the cracks. Areas where it has been widened are not within the regulations and thus causing damage to adjoining properties. You need to stop wasting money patching it and rebuild/relay the road in a condition suitable for the tarffic

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Bramble Chase, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet
